name: NPEFS SOR v2.pdf
summary: The NPEFS project focuses on creating a centralized system to automate financial calculations and reporting for the federal National Public Education Finance Survey, to replace manual processes currently using Excel. The project requires detailed deliverables, compliance with Indiana Office of Technology standards, and integration with IDOE systems.
client: Indiana Department of Education (IDOE)

client: Indiana Office of Technology (IOT)

name: CAI_ALABAMA_Supplier_Agreement_v2025.04.01-final.pdf

name: ICHE Custom Application Maintenance, Support, and Enhancement Services- SOR.pdf
